nodes.text: Ilum crystals were a type of kyber crystals found deep within the caves of the snow-covered planet Ilum. They were regarded as some of the best crystals for making lightsabers.

The Jedi were often known to travel to the planet Ilum as padawans to find a Ilum Crystal during a religious event called "The Gathering". The Padawans would then through the sense of the Force, locate their crystal and then bring it back to the temple front gate.[source?]
It was said by Hondo Ohnaka that the amount of credits that a Ilum Crystal was worth was enough to make a man rich.[source?]
